email.text:

The hotel chosen for this trip is Don Giovanni Hotel (4-star). You will be responsible for **buying your own flight tickets** but the hotel will be booked by us. You will be able to pay for the hotel via the Union website. This way we can stay together.
The hotel will be booked for triple rooms (all single beds) from 25th May to 27th May (2 nights). If you donâ€™t like this place you are welcome to stay elsewhere but you will miss out ðŸ˜‰
Please head to the Union website: https://www.imperialcollegeunion.org/shop/club-society-project-products/computing-products/26747/docsoc-goes-to-prague to secure your hotel booking. Once you have bought the Union ticket, proceed to buy flight tickets for 25th May morning departure and 27th May evening return.
Note: the deadline to pay for hotel tickets on the Union website is Thursday 4th April at 12pm!
If you are an international student and would like to go on this trip, please check out: https://www.vfsglobal.com/czechrepublic/UK/Tourist.html to find out whether you require a visa for this trip and the steps required to apply for a visa if needed (if you donâ€™t already have one). If you have any doubts about the visa application process, please contact us and we will be able to help.
